category.item: Gli utenti possono ignorare questo forum
I messaggi sono utilizzati per calcolare le discussioni simili
Visualizzare sotto-forum nella lista bordo pagina
Forces selected style upon board visit
La board generale selezionata non è valida
Questo forum non è più visibile sulla lista dei forum, ma si può accedere ad esso tramite un link diretto.

category.name: wbb.acp.bulkProcessing
category.item:
L´azione scelta influenza {#$affectedThreads} discussioni.{if $affectedThreads > 0}
Si prega di assicurarsi di “Verifica integrità” successivamente.{/if}
Processo completo di discussioni saranno trattati senza ulteriore conferma per tutte le tue decisioni.

L´azione scelta influenza {#$affectedPosts} messaggi.{if $affectedPosts > 0}
Si prega di assicurarsi di “Verifica integrità” successivamente.{/if}
Processo completo di messaggi saranno trattati senza ulteriore conferma per tutte le tue decisioni.

category.name: wbb.index
category.item: Segna tutti i forum come letti

{#$stats[members]} Utenti - {#$stats[threads]} Discussioni - {#$stats[posts]} Messaggi ({#$stats[postsPerDay]} Messaggi per giorno)
Ultimo utente registrato: {$stats[newestMember]->username}.
Forum Software: Burning Board®{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@PACKAGE_VERSION}{/if}, sviluppato da WoltLab® GmbH

TODO: Questo software è una versione di prova. L´utilizzo è consentito sino al {@WBB_EVALUATION_END|plainTime}{if WBB_EVALUATION_END > TIME_NOW} ({@WBB_EVALUATION_END|dateDiff:TIME_NOW}){/if}. Per un uso legale di questo software oltre tale limite di tempo sarà necessario comprare la licenza, o eliminare il software e il suo contenuto subito!

category.name: wbb.post
category.item: Questo messaggio è stato eliminato {if $post->userID == $post->getLogEntry()->userID}dallo stesso autore{else}da “{$post->getLogEntry()->username}”{/if}{if $post->getLogEntry()->reason}: “{$post->getLogEntry()->reason}”{/if} ({@$post->getLogEntry()->time|time}).
Il messaggio è stato eliminato senza ulteriori informazioni.
Il messaggio è stato modificata {#$post->editCount} volte, ultima modifica da “{$post->editor}”{if $post->editReason}: {$post->editReason}{/if} ({@$post->lastEditTime|time}).
Vuoi veramente eliminare definitivamente il messaggio?
All displayed posts will be merged into the first post. Sort posts by drag & drop to determine the first post and the merge order.
Do you really want to delete this post?
Thread will be closed after your post has been created.
Thread will require approval to be published.
Post will require approval to be published.
Adds this thread to your watch list.

"{@$author->username}" replied to the thread "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->topic}" in forum "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->getBoard()->title|language}": {link controller='Thread' object=$userNotificationObject->getThread() application='wbb' encode=false forceFrontend=true}postID={@$userNotificationObject->postID}{/link}#post{@$userNotificationObject->postID}
Quoted one of your posts in the thread “{$userNotificationObject->getThread()->topic}”.

{@$author->username} quoted one of your posts in thread "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->topic}" in forum "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->getBoard()->title|language}" zitiert: {link controller='Thread' object=$userNotificationObject->getThread() application='wbb' encode=false forceFrontend=true}postID={@$userNotificationObject->postID}{/link}#post{@$userNotificationObject->postID}

{@$author->username} mentioned you in the thread "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->topic}" in forum "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->getBoard()->title|language}": {link controller='Thread' object=$userNotificationObject->getThread() application='wbb' encode=false forceFrontend=true}postID={@$userNotificationObject->postID}{/link}#post{@$userNotificationObject->postID}
Message is too short, it must contain at least {#$minCharLength} characters.
Message is too short, it must contain at least {#$minWordCount} words.

You have already written a post within the last {#$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.board.floodControlTime')} seconds. You have to wait at least {#$lastPostTime+$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.board.floodControlTime')-TIME_NOW} seconds before attempting to write a new one.
Newly created posts need to be manually approved prior to publication. You can neither see nor edit this post until it has been approved.
Your post requires manual approval and will not be displayed until then.

category.name: wbb.thread
category.item: Do you really want to permanently delete this thread, cannot be reverted.
Do you really want to delete this thread?
Newly created threads need to be manually approved prior to publication. You can neither see nor edit this thread until it has been approved.
Your thread requires manual approval and will not be displayed until then.
"There " + ((data.returnValues.newPostsCount == 1) ? "is 1 new post" : "are " + data.returnValues.newPostsCount + " new posts") + " in this thread."
There {if $count == 1}is 1 new post{else}are {#$count} new posts{/if} on the next page.
Last reply was more than {#WBB_REPLY_OLD_THREAD_WARNING} days ago, this thread is most likely obsolete. It is recommended to create a new thread instead.
The following threads matched your title:
You’re not watching any threads yet.
Double-Click to Mark This Thread Read

category.name: wbb.thread.log
category.item: There are no log entries for this thread.
Prohibited editing of post{if $post->subject} “{$post->subject}”{/if} by “{$post->username}” ({@$post->time|time})
post{if $post->subject} “{$post->subject}”{/if} edited by “{$post->username}” ({@$post->time|time})
Allowed editing of post{if $post->subject} “{$post->subject}”{/if} by “{$post->username}” ({@$post->time|time})
post{if $post->subject} “{$post->subject}”{/if} restored by “{$post->username}” ({@$post->time|time})
post{if $post->subject} “{$post->subject}”{/if} moved to trash bin by “{$post->username}” ({@$post->time|time})
Thread moved from forum “{$additionalData[oldBoard][title]|language}” to forum “{$additionalData[newBoard][title]|language}”
Thread was deleted by “{if $userID}{$username}{else}{$username}{/if}”{if $additionalData[reason]}: “{$additionalData[reason]}”{/if} ({@$time|time})

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Shows only threads within the given time frame.
Display notice for threads in trash bin
Maximum depth of forums shown on the forums list
Show last post of each forum
Show thread and post count for each forum
Show thread language with a flag
Show page numbers on thread list
Allows users to navigate to a specific page within a thread.
Allow marking of threads as done
Editing within this period does not show an edit note [time in minutes]
Marks threads as dated based on the time of last reply [time in days]. Users attempting to reply to this thread will receive a notice.
Number of previous replies displayed on the extended reply form.
Links for moved threads will be removed after this period. [time in days, 0 to disable]
Threads and posts within the trash bin will be removed after this period. [time in days, 0 to disable]
Show note for posts in trash bin
Posts in trash bin will be replaced with a notice on post list
Users can assign tags to each thread which will be also displayed in the tag cloud.
Threads will be marked as done based on the time of last reply [time in days, 0 to disable]
Exclude guests from user online record
Allows users to ignore individual forums.
Notify of similar threads during thread creation
Searches for similar thread based on the thread title and displays a list of matches.
Last reply of similar threads must not be prior this period [time in days]
Threads within this forum will be displayed as News on Dashboard.
Last reply of threads must not be prior this period. [time in days]
Show post count in user profile
